title: How to use AI to create romantic couple poses and pictures: 5 effective prompts
description: It is often said that a picture is worth a thousand words, and, considering the digital world we live in, this seems to be true. Most couples these days like posting their pictures online-- be it for gaining likes or expressing their love for each other. This makes posing aesthetically with your partner and using the right caption for your social media posts important. With the rise of Artificial Intelligence (AI), did you know that you can now use it to create romantic couple poses and pictures? All you need is the right prompt for it.Apart from this, you can also use these prompts for designing AI art, planning couple photoshoots or for social media content.Photo: AI generated using Canva

title: Eight ways AI affected pop culture in 2025
description: Artificial intelligence made a significant impact on pop culture in 2025. AI-generated music topped charts, and films used AI for accent enhancement. Classic movies were reimagined with AI, and podcast hosts cloned their voices. Deceased celebrities appeared in AI-generated videos, sparking debate. Hollywood grappled with AI's role, with some directors opposing its use.
